itemData.name: Reins of the Azure Netherwing Drake
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Reins of the Azure Netherwing Drake
Binds when picked up
Unique
Requires Level 70
Requires Riding (300)
Use: Teaches you how to summon this mount. Can only be summoned in Outland or Northrend. This is a very fast mount.
1 Charge
